verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w set|strong="H7931"\w* \w up|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* though \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w subdued|strong="H3533"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*,

\w there|strong="H3498"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* still \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w received|strong="H2505"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* said \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w How|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w off|strong="H5414"\w* entering \w and|strong="H1121"\w* possessing \w the|strong="H5414"\w* land \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers, \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*?

\w Appoint|strong="H7971"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w men|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* each \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H6310"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* survey \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w land|strong="H5159"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w map|strong="H3789"\w* \w it|strong="H1980"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w*, \w according|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* each. \w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H6310"\w* \w will|strong="H6310"\w* \w return|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*

\w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H2506"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w portions|strong="H2506"\w*. \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w remain|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w territory|strong="H1366"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w remain|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w territory|strong="H1366"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* mapped \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w portions|strong="H2506"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cast|strong="H3384"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w however|strong="H3588"\w*, \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3947"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priesthood|strong="H3550"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* already \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w east|strong="H4217"\w*.”

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w men|strong="H1980"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w out|strong="H7993"\w*, \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w map|strong="H3789"\w* \w out|strong="H7993"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*, saying, “\w Go|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* survey \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*, \w map|strong="H3789"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w out|strong="H7993"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H7651"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w throughout|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H2506"\w*, mapping \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w portions|strong="H2506"\w*. \w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* returned \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* document \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w distributed|strong="H2505"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* according \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w divisions|strong="H4256"\w*. Benjamin’s Inheritance

\w The|strong="H3318"\w* \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*. \w Their|strong="H3318"\w* \w allotted|strong="H1486"\w* \w territory|strong="H1366"\w* \w lay|strong="H1121"\w* between \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*:
On the north side their border began at the Jordan, went up past the northern slope of Jericho, headed west through the hill country, and came out at the wilderness of Beth-aven.
From there the border crossed over to the southern slope of Luz (that is, Bethel) and went down to Ataroth-addar on the hill south of Lower Beth-horon.

On the west side the border curved southward from the hill facing Beth-horon on the south and came out at Kiriath-baal (that is, Kiriath-jearim), a city of the sons of Judah. This was the western side.
On the south side the border began at the outskirts of Kiriath-jearim and extended westward to the spring at the Waters of Nephtoah.

Then it went down to the foot of the hill that faces the Valley of Hinnom at the northern end of the Valley of Rephaim and ran down the Valley of Hinnom toward the southern slope of the Jebusites and downward to En-rogel.
From there it curved northward and proceeded to En-shemesh and on to Geliloth facing the Ascent of Adummim, and continued down to the Stone of Bohan son of Reuben.
Then it went on to the northern slope of Beth-arabah \f + \fr 18:18 \ft LXX; Hebrew slope facing the Arabah\f* and went down into the valley.

The border continued to the northern slope of Beth-hoglah and came out at the northern bay of the Salt Sea,\f + \fr 18:19 \ft That is, the Dead Sea\f* at the mouth of the Jordan. This was the southern border.

On the east side the border was the Jordan. \w These|strong="H2063"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* \w borders|strong="H1367"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

These \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*: Jericho, Beth-hoglah, Emek-keziz,
Beth-arabah, Zemaraim, Bethel,
Avvim, Parah, Ophrah,
Chephar-ammoni, Ophni, and Geba—twelve cities, along with their villages.
Gibeon, Ramah, Beeroth,
Mizpeh, Chephirah, Mozah,
Rekem, Irpeel, Taralah,

Zelah, Haeleph, Jebus \f + \fr 18:28 \ft LXX, Syriac, and Vulgate; Hebrew the Jebusite\f* (that is, Jerusalem), Gibeah,\f + \fr 18:28 \ft Hebrew Gibeath \f* and Kiriath-jearim \f + \fr 18:28 \ft LXX; Hebrew Kiriath\f*—fourteen cities, along with their villages. \w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.
